desc: A classic that just keeps getting better, The Little SAS Book is essential for anyone learning SAS programming. Lora Delwiche and Susan Slaughter offer a user-friendly approach so readers can quickly and easily learn the most commonly used features of the SAS language. Each topic is presented in a self-contained two-page layout complete with examples and graphics.

details.authors: Lora D. Delwiche, Susan J. Slaughter

title: The Little SAS Book: A Primer, Fifth Edition
